message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  While I'm interested, $150 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now.  I'm willing to pay $110 for it. Let me know what you think.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product. Let me know what you think!
Alice,  I appreciate you coming down a bit.  I'm still a bit higher than I'd like to go, but I'm willing to offer $125.  It's a fair price, and I'm confident you'll find a buyer at that price.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $127. It's a great price, and I think you'll really love the product. Let me know what you think!
